pages.text: $(li)The Faucet can be activated by right clicking it's handle.$(br)$(li)If it's powered with redstone its active and non active states are inverted.
$(li)It extracts items from the inventory bellow and spill them right bellow it's nozzle with a one second interval.
$(li)You can connect a Faucet in a fluid containing block.$(br)$(li)This will only be possible in 250mb increment.
$(li)Once it's connected to a fluid containing block behind it can pour those fluids in any possible fluid container block below it.
$(li)Faucets can dump fluids in $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/sponge)Sponges$(/l) effectively voiding them.
